additional_info:
Satellite, Security, Duplex, Elevator, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Flat for rent! Tbilisi, Vake-Saburtalo (Shanghai) district. Duplex type flat with two bedroom on the second floor, living room and a kitchen in a new 6 level building, for rent 5th and 6th floors, total area of 127sqm, open balcony 11sqm, fully furnished, Air conditioner, TV Satellite, Telephone land line, Wi-Fi, kitchen full set, mini bar, central heating system, washing machine, isolated children playground, underground garage and street parking, very quiet and comfortable area. Price USD 1000 per month. For any further information Please, message or call me at 599969875 George.
